flight_system
Class FlightFilter

java.lang.Object
  flight_system.FlightFilter

public class FlightFilter
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to represent a flight filter based on flights.

Author:
Daoheng Guo

Constructor Summary
FlightFilter()
          Makes a flight filter without any flights in the list.
FlightFilter(java.util.ArrayList<Flight> flightList)
          Creates an flight filter object with flights in the list.

cheapestFlight

public Flight cheapestFlight(boolean isFirstClass)
This method returns the cheapest flight from the flight list.

Parameters:
isFirstClass - true if you want the flight with the cheapest first class seat. False if you want the flight with the cheapest coach class seat.
Returns:
the cheapest flight in the list.

filterDepTime

public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> filterDepTime(Time depTime,
                                                 boolean after,
                                                 Airport airport)
This method returns a flight list that has only flights that leave after or before a given time (inclusive).

Parameters:
depTime - the time for the departure
after - true if you want flights that leave after a certain time (inclusive)
Returns:
the filtered flight list.

isFirstClass - true if you want the sort price returned is first class false if you want the sort price returned is coach class

the sorted flights in a order decide by you
